Package model

Class NTAudios

java.lang.Object
model.NTAudios
public class NTAudios extends Object
This class allows executing most of the methods that represent the functionalities of the program.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NTAudios()
    NTAudios: Constructor method that allows to initialize the arraylist of users of the platform.

  • Constructor Details

    • NTAudios

      public NTAudios()
      NTAudios: Constructor method that allows to initialize the arraylist of users of the platform.

  • Method Details

    • registerProducerUser

      public String registerProducerUser(String nickname, String id, String name, String imageURL, int choice)
      registerProducerUser: This method allows registering producer users within the user arraylist of the platform, if the user to be created does not yet exist.
      Parameters:
      nickname - : String: Nickname of the producer user.
      id - : String: ID of the producer user.
      name - : String: Name of the producer user.
      imageURL - : String: URL of the image representing the producer user.
      choice - : int: Choice that allows to create and add an artist or a content creator.
      Returns:
      msj: String: Confirmation message if the producer user was added or not.

    • registerConsumerUser

      public String registerConsumerUser(String nickname, String id, int choice)
      registerConsumerUser: This method allows registering consumer users within the user arraylist of the platform, if the user to be created does not yet exist.
      Parameters:
      nickname - : String: Nickname of the consumer user.
      id - : String: ID of the consumer user.
      choice - : int: Choice that allows to create and add an standard or a premium user.
      Returns:
      msj: String: Confirmation message if the consumer user was added or not.

    • addAudioToThePlatform

      public void addAudioToThePlatform(Audio audio)

    • registerSong

      public String registerSong(String name, String imageURL, double duration, String album, String musicalGenre, double saleValue, String producerId)
      registerSong: This method allows to register songs within the arraylist of songs that an artist has, if the song does not yet exist within the artist.
      Parameters:
      name - : String: Name of the song.
      imageURL - : String: URL of the image that represents the album of the song.
      duration - : double: Time in minutes that a song lasts.
      album - : String: Album to which the song belongs.
      musicalGenre - : String(Enum): Musical genre of the song.
      saleValue - : double: Sales value of the song.
      userId - : ID of the artist to which the song belongs.
      Returns:
      msj: String: Confirmation message if the song was created and added within the artist it belongs to.

    • registerPodcast

      public String registerPodcast(String name, String imageURL, double duration, String description, String podcastCategory, String producerId)
      registerPodcast: This method allows to register podcasts within the arraylist of podcasts that a content creator has, if the podcast does not yet exist within the * content creator.
      Parameters:
      name - : String: Name of the podcast.
      imageURL - : String: URL of the distinctive image representing the podcast.
      duration - : double: Time in minutes that a podcast lasts.
      description - : String: Description of the podcast.
      podcastCategory - : String(Enum): Category of the podcast.
      userId - : String: ID of the content creator to which the podcast belongs.
      Returns:
      msj: String: Confirmation message if the podcast was created and added within the content creator it belongs to.

    • createAPlaylist

      public String createAPlaylist(String name, String consumerId)
      createAPlaylist: This method allows you to create a playlist within a consumer user. If you are a standard user, you will only have 20 playlists.
      Parameters:
      name - : String: Name of the playlist.
      consumerId - : String: ID of the consumer user who will have the playlist.
      Returns:
      msj: String: Confirmation message if the playlist could be created within the consumer user.

    • addAudioToThePlaylist

      public String addAudioToThePlaylist(String audioName, String producerId, String playlistName, String consumerId)
      editPlaylist: This method allows to edit a playlist (add songs or podcasts).
      Parameters:
      audioName - : String: Name of the audio to be added.
      producerId - : String: ID of the producer user to which the audio to be added belongs.
      playlistName - : String: Name of the playlist to be edited.
      consumerId - : String: ID of the consumer user to which the playlist belongs.
      choice - : int: Integer representing the option to add a song or podcast.
      Returns:
      msj: String: Confirmation message if the audio can be added to the playlist. In addition, the playlist matrix and the auto-generated code are displayed.

    • deleteAudioFromThePlaylist

      public String deleteAudioFromThePlaylist(String audioName, String producerId, String playlistName, String consumerId)

    • sharePlaylist

      public String sharePlaylist(String consumerSharerId, String codePlaylist, String consumerReceptorId)

    • runMatrix

      public String runMatrix(String playlistName, String consumerId)
      runMatrix: This method allows to traverse the playlist matrix depending on its content. If it contains only songs the path is an N, if it contains only podcasts * the path is a T, and if it contains both the path is a zigzag.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - : String: Name of the playlist to go through.
      consumerId - : String: ID of the consumer user who owns the playlist.
      Returns:
      msj: String: Message showing the matrix and the generated code depending on the path. Otherwise, it shows that there are no audios in the playlist.

    • countSongsInAPlaylist

      public int countSongsInAPlaylist(ArrayList<Audio> audioList)
      countSongsInAPlaylist: This method allows to count the songs within a playlist.
      Parameters:
      playlist - : ArrayList
      Returns:
      songCounter: int: Song counter.

    • countPodcastsInAPlaylist

      public int countPodcastsInAPlaylist(ArrayList<Audio> audioList)
      countPodcastsInAPlaylist: This method allows to count the podcasts within a playlist.
      Parameters:
      playlist - : ArrayList
      Returns:
      podcastCounter: int: Podcast counter.

      Parameters:
      musicalGenre - : String: Musical genre.
      Returns:
      wasFound: boolean: Boolean that confirms whether the enum exists or not.

    • searchUserById

      public int searchUserById(String userId)
      searchUserById: Method to search for a user within the user arraylist.
      Parameters:
      userId - : String: ID of the user to search for.
      Returns:
      pos: int: Position of the user within the user arraylist. If it does not exist, returns -1.

    • searchSongByName

      public int searchSongByName(String userId, String songName)
      searchSongByName: Method that allows to search for a song within an artist's song arraylist.
      Parameters:
      userId - : String: ID of the user to whom the song belongs.
      songName - : String: Name of the song to be searched.
      Returns:
      pos: int: Position of the song within the song arraylist. If it does not exist, returns -1.

    • searchSongByName

      public int searchSongByName(String songName)

    • searchPodcastByName

      public int searchPodcastByName(String userId, String podcastName)
      searchPodcastByName: Method that allows to search for a podcast within an content creator's podcast arraylist.
      Parameters:
      userId - : String: ID of the user to whom the podcast belongs.
      podcastName - : String: Name of the podcast to be searched.
      Returns:
      pos: int: Position of the podcast within the podcast arraylist. If it does not exist, returns -1.

    • searchPlaylistByName

      public int searchPlaylistByName(String consumerId, String playlistName)
      searchPlaylistByName: Method that allows to search for a playlist within a user's playlist arraylist.
      Parameters:
      consumerId - : String: ID of the user to whom the playlist belongs.
      name - : String: Name of the playlist to be searched.
      Returns:
      pos: int: Position of the playlist within the playlist arraylist or array. If it does not exist, returns -1.
